testcase.name: Products Different Than The Searched Product Should Be Cheaper Than The Searched Product

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The price of another product is greater than the Iphone at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at paginas.PageAmazon.validateValueFoundProductsAreCheaperThanThe(PageAmazon.java:120) at steps.SearchInAmazonSteps.makeSureAllFoundProductsAreCheaperThanTheCheapest(SearchInAmazonSteps.java:72) at ✽.Then Make Sure All Found Products Are Cheaper Than The Cheapest "Iphone"(SearchInAmazon.feature:24)

testcase.failure:
Given Open Browser on "www.google.com"......................................passed And Search for "Amazon Brasil" and Search...................................passed And Navigate to "www.amazon.com.br" Through The Search Page.................passed And Search For "Iphone" Using The Search Bar................................passed And Find Products Which Are Not "Iphone"....................................passed Then Make Sure All Found Products Are Cheaper Than The Cheapest "Iphone"....failed
